intent_atoms.description: The system must always register tfdt, trun, and traf parsers in BoxParserRegistry to provide fragment environment plumbing.
Provide structured payloads for track fragments with resolved defaults.
Typed models for track fragment decode time, run entries, and aggregated fragment summaries must be available with JSON and CLI formatting coverage.
Validation must include VR-017 fragment run checks.
Expose fragment metadata in DASH segment exports via refreshed snapshot.

functional_units.name: Track Fragment Parser Registration
functional_units.description: Registers tfdt, trun, and traf parsers in BoxParserRegistry to handle track fragment parsing.

functional_units.name: Typed Models for Track Fragment Data
functional_units.description: Provides typed models for decode time, run entries, and aggregated fragment summaries with JSON and CLI formatting.

functional_units.name: Fragment Run Validation
functional_units.description: Extends validation logic with VR-017 checks for fragment runs.

functional_units.name: DASH Segment Snapshot Export
functional_units.description: Refreshes DASH segment snapshot to include fragment metadata in exports.

functional_units.name: CLI Formatting for Fragment Summaries
functional_units.description: Formats track fragment summaries for command-line interface output.

functional_units.name: JSON Export of Fragment Metadata
functional_units.description: Exports structured payloads with JSON formatting for track fragments.
